it.polimi.ingsw.controller

Class ToolCardCheck

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polimi.ingsw.controller.ToolCardCheck

  • public class ToolCardCheck
extends java.lang.Object
    Checks if a ToolCard effect can be used.

    • Method Detail

      • toolCard1

        public boolean toolCard1(Die d,
                         int action)
        Checks if the ToolCard1 effect can be used.
        Parameters:
        d - a die from the draft pool.
        action - 0: decrease, 1: increase.
        Returns:
        false if a player try to make an illegal move; true otherwise.

      • toolCard2

        public boolean toolCard2(WindowPattern window,
                         int x,
                         int y,
                         int a,
                         int b)
        Checks if the ToolCard2 effect can be used.
        Parameters:
        window - the window of a player.
        x - the column of the selected die in the window.
        y - the row of the selected die in the window.
        a - the destination column of the selected die in the window.
        b - the destination row of the selected die in the window.
        Returns:
        true if a player try to make a legal move; false otherwise.

                         int y2,
                         int a2,
                         int b2)
        Checks if the ToolCard4 effect can be used.
        Parameters:
        window - the window of a player.
        x - the column of the first selected die in the window.
        y - the row of the second selected die in the window.
        a - the column of the second selected die in the window.
        b - the row of the second selected die in the window.
        x2 - the destination column of the first selected die in the window.
        y2 - the destination row of the first selected die in the window.
        a2 - the destination column of the second selected die in the window.
        b2 - the destination row of the second selected die in the window.
        Returns:
        true if a player try to make a legal move; false otherwise.

        Checks if the ToolCard1 effect can be used.

        window - the window of a player.

        Returns:

        track - a round track.
        window - the window of a player.

        y2 - the destination row of the first selected die in the window.
